DATA.XAML: <Canvas xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/client/2007"> <Border Background="LightSalmon" Padding="10" CornerRadius="20" Height="42" Width="227"> <TextBlock FontSize="16" >PARAMETRE_1</TextBlock> </Border> </Canvas>

<Canvas xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/client/2007"> <!-- Offset the text using a TranslateTransform. --> <TextBlock FontFamily = "Verdana" FontSize = "32" FontWeight = "Bold" Foreground = "Black" Text="PARAMETRE_1"> <TextBlock.RenderTransform> <TranslateTransform X="2" Y="2" /> </TextBlock.RenderTransform> </TextBlock>
<TextBlock FontFamily = "Verdana" FontSize = "32" FontWeight = "Bold" Foreground = "Coral" Text="PARAMETRE_1"/> </Canvas>

<Canvas xmlns = "http://schemas.microsoft.com/client/2007" xmlns: x = "http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" Width="250" Height="30">
<!-- Define a LinearGradientBrush for the Canvas Background property. --> <Canvas.Background> <LinearGradientBrush> <GradientStop Color="Yellow" Offset="0.0" /> <GradientStop Color="Orange" Offset="0.2" /> <GradientStop Color="Red" Offset="0.6" /> <GradientStop Color="Orange" Offset="0.8" /> <GradientStop Color="Yellow" Offset="1.0" /> </LinearGradientBrush> </Canvas.Background> <TextBlock Canvas.Left="30" Foreground="Maroon" FontFamily="Verdana" FontSize="24" FontWeight="Bold" Text="PARAMETRE_1" /> </Canvas>

<Canvas xmlns = "http://schemas.microsoft.com/client/2007" xmlns: x = "http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" Width="250" Height="30">
<TextBlock Canvas.Left="30" Foreground="Black" FontFamily="Verdana" FontSize="9" FontWeight="Bold" Text="PARAMETRE_1" /> </Canvas>
